channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
ok i have downloaded evilscape source and jdk 6.0 AND 6.1 so that i have both if it dosent work on one. i have the ocmpiler that says this when u start it:
Please choose an option below to do that function. Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for any updates that I post. c - Compile your server. r - To Run your server. e - To exit out of the program. color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler. reset - Resets your Compiler Logs. Option:
so i press c then enter then a new message comes up saying:
You need to have Java files for this Compiler to Compile. Press any key to continue . . .
How do i fix this or find my java files??? Thanks~ P00n y4

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @golddealer golddealer
item.description:
@golddealer wrote:

This is what you must do with the compile and runserver:

Right mouse click on the compile, and click: edit. Than you make the page blank, and fill in this code:

@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Then you save it.

Then you go to the runserver and click on the rightmouse button, and click edit. Make the page blank and type this code:

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Save this to!

Then it should work… If not so… Get pimpscape

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @golddealer golddealer
item.description:
@golddealer wrote:

Control panel >> System >> Advanced system settings >> Environment variables.

Sett the variable called: path to PATH en click on edit then variable valeu: C:Windows\System32;“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0\bin” (!copy and paste the whole code!)

Then make a new variable called: classpath and edit this variable valeu: “C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin” (!copy and paste the whole code!)

Hope this will help!

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @poon_y4 poon y4
item.description:
@poon_y4 wrote:

yeah i got the evilscape 1.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 09:36:19 AM[/size][hr][quote=“golddealer, post:2, topic:78406”]Easy, java hasn’t got the 1.6.0.0 file’s any more… So just change it in the environment variables into: 1.6.0_01 (in the already installed variable).

Hope this helps![/quote]

walk me through it please, control pannel, then what?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 09:37:17 AM[/size][hr]gold i havent got a enviromental variables for java :S ive only got:

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @golddealer golddealer
item.description:
@golddealer wrote:

Easy, java hasn’t got the 1.6.0.0 file’s any more… So just change it in the environment variables into: 1.6.0_01 (in the already installed variable).

Hope this helps!

Read full topic
